argument.name: LastDate
argument.description: The last date of the previous month.

argument.name: date
argument.description: Optional. Default = today. The date to use when calculating the last day of the previous month.

page.description: Returns the last day of the previous month for a given date. If no argument is supplied, returns last day of the previous month for the current date.
page.discussion: The Date_LastDayOfPreviousMonth() function returns the last day of the previous month.
